blogPost.title:
Best Performing Stocks in the Russell 1000 last year...

1) Tesla $TSLA: +743%
2) Enphase Energy $ENPH: +572%
3) Peloton $PTON: +434%
4) Moderna $MRNA: +434%
5) Zoom $ZM: +396% https://t.co/t6xeWpKL8Z
